company operates new and used car transaction marketplaces; an automotive marketing platform; an online business-to-business car auction portal; a car search portal; and a\\nmarketplace for multi-brand certified pre-owned cars.Â Cox Automotive, Inc. was formerly known as AutoTrader Group, Inc. It has locations worldwide.
